snippet: Witnesses testified by video at a hearing in Washington State in the case against Staff Sgt. Robert Bales, who is accused of killing 16 Afghan civilians.
abstract: Witnesses testify by video from Afghanistan at Washington State hearing in case against Staff Sgt Robert Bales, who is accused of killing 16 Afghan civilians; most of testimony, while graphic, is circumstantial, pointing to lone American gunman but not directly implicating Bales.
lead_paragraph: Witnesses testified by video at a hearing in Washington State in the case against Staff Sgt. Robert Bales, who is accused of killing 16 Afghan civilians.

headline.seo: In Soldier’s Hearing, Afghans Tell of Horror
headline.main: At Soldier’s Hearing, Grisly Descriptions of Chaos and Horror
headline.print_headline: In G.I. Hearing, Afghans Recall Night of Shots, Chaos and Gore

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
